tool_description: IMDb is an online database of information related to films, television series, podcasts, home videos, video games, and streaming content online – including cast, production crew and personal biographies, plot summaries, trivia, ratings, and fan and critical reviews.
name: IMDB
title: IMDB

api_list.name: Get Popular Movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb188.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getPopularMovies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb188.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
